email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is a 150,000 DWT Aframax with an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Could you consider lowering it to the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can adjust the freight rate to $50.75 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Please confirm if this works for you so we can proceed with the fixture. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, the adjusted freight rate and demurrage terms are acceptable. Let's proceed with the fixture. Could you send over the charter party agreement for review? Also, please confirm the vessel's ETA at Rotterdam. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that. I'll send over the charter party agreement shortly. The vessel's ETA at Rotterdam is 14 October. I'll keep you updated if there are any changes. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. I've reviewed the charter party agreement and everything looks good. Let's finalize the fixture. Please confirm once done. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, the fixture is now finalized. The vessel is confirmed for loading at Rotterdam between 15-20 October, with a freight rate of $50.75 per metric ton and a demurrage rate of $15,000 per day. I'll send you the final confirmation shortly. Thanks for your cooperation. Best regards, Sarah
